text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The criterion specifically requires the response to advise that Irrevocable Powers of Attorney (POA) must be used for the Drag-Along clause to overcome the mandatory notarial execution requirement for share transfers in a GmbH (GmbHG ยง15). The candidate answer mentions a Drag-Along right under the Tag-Along section, stating: \"include a drag-along as the reciprocal - founders will want this, and it is reasonable.\" However, it completely fails to mention or advise on the critical German law mechanism (Irrevocable POA) required to make a Drag-Along clause enforceable against a dissenting minority shareholder in a GmbH context, which is the core requirement of this criterion.", "criterion_id": "fef48e03-e31a-4f54-b43c-03457f162075"}
